docs.lead_paragraph: Legends About Trees. CHRISTMAS is the only holiday identified with certain vegetable growths -- the holly, the mistletoe, and the Christmas tree. The veneration in which these are held goes back to a remote antiquity. There are, however, some strange and curious legends attaching to other products of the vegetable kingdom.
